title: Sell a Luxury Suite for a Season
description: A corporate client wants to lease a luxury suite for the entire upcoming football season.

tasks.description: Check the availability of suites for the full season.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that Suite 215 is available.

tasks.description: Provide the client with the season lease price and a list of included amenities.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the price and benefits (e.g., VIP parking, catering credit).

tasks.description: Generate and send the season lease agreement to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the contract for e-signature.

tasks.description: Once signed, process the deposit payment and mark the suite as 'Sold' for the season.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the payment and updates the suite's status.
